attributes.action: To guarantee the hair/beauty industry will be able to reopen on the 2nd December
attributes.additional_details:
The hair beauty industry contributed over £7.5bn in turnover to the UK economy in 2017.
The infection rate for our industry is 0.05 most salons have more measures in place than a hospital. 
We were labelled retail initially then added to hospitality but got thrown under a bus and labelled close contact when the hospitality sector got a vat reduction.
Too many salons have already had to permanently close their doors.
We are essential to the economy, mental health and many people’s livelihoods.
attributes.background:
To guarantee the hair and beauty industry will be able to reopen on the 2nd December and not be forced to close again. 
Also our industry should come under essential services.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reopen salons during lockdown with measures in place to practice safe services: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319313

Keep the beauty industry open: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554478

Do not require salons to close due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555408
